title: Ariat M2 Relaxed Boot Cut Jeans – Men’s Relaxed Fit Denim
description: STACKABLE BOOT CUT: Go-anywhere, do-anything denim, these bootcut jeans are relaxed through the waist, hip and thigh for the most comfortable fit, all day long; Show off your boots with the stackable design, creating a perfect over-the-boot silhouette

PREMIUM FEATURES: These western jeans for men have no-rub comfort inseams that prevent abrasion against the skin; Other features include reinforced pockets with coin pocket feature, anchored belt loops, and heavy-duty zippers and hardware

GREAT GIFTS: Shopping for your husband or boyfriend shouldn't be difficult, and with these durable jeans from Ariat, it won't be; Perfect for work, outdoor or a night out, the hard-working man can wear these jeans for any occasion

MADE TO LAST: Made of a superior blend of cotton, the ring-spun denim gives these pants optimum durability; These jeans are made to last and create a western style statement that cowboys are known for

SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions; Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability;

Ride, ranch or hit the town by wearing the M2 Boot Cut Jeans for men . Featuring a design that is relaxed through waist, hip, and thigh, these comfortable and durable western jeans are sure to create an authentic style statement. Made of ring-spun denim, these men’s jeans are machine washable using cold water and a light spin cycle. The boot cut design brings a modern twist to the classic fashion. These bootcut jeans feature anchored belt loops, no-rub inseams for rash-proof wearing comfort and are fitted with heavy-duty zippers and hardware. It has handcrafted pocket designs with embroidered stitching that add more character. These have a stackable design that lets you create over-the-boot silhouettes. Moreover, the extra-deep front pockets of these jeans make sure your belongings stay safe and secure.No matter what you need, there’s an Ariat product made for you. Ariat works with global suppliers to develop new material that is lighter, cooler and more durable than anything else in the market. Every product, from hiking and work boots to western casual wear and English riding gear, gets field tested with people like you, enabling us to consistently raise the bar for functionality and style.Ariat is committed to building a different breed of company, one that reflects our core values as a team and those of our consumers. Our company values have shaped our success since 1993 — a commitment to innovation, quality, integrity, teamwork and respect.
